title: Virtual Assistant and Skills workspace schema
description: This is a schema that captures the relationship between the virtual assistant and its skills

$schema.description: The schema to verify this workspace file against

workspace.description: Path to the virtual assistant. Relative to the workspace file or an absolute path

skills.description: List of endpoints supported by the skill

manifest.description: Path to the manifest file on local file system or a URL to a remote skill

remote.description: Indication if the skill is remote or local skill
remote.title: isRemote

endpointName.description: Indicates the name of the skill endpoint to use for binding with the Virtual assistant. If skill is remote no need for this property.
